item.description:
I know it is Superbowl Sunday. But this film which kicks off the Latin America Film series at the Wadsworth Atheneum starts at 2:00 pm. You'll be home in front of the TV by 4:15 pm, plenty of time before the kickoff.

A man seeking revenge for his brother's murder meets a lonely woman on the streets of Bogota one rainy evening in what turns out to be a life-altering night. Columbia/Argentina
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby, Kinda looking like my picture.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: La Sangre Y La LLuvia (Blood and Rain)
